column1: Examples of neighbor clusters ( NCs) enriched in differentially expressed genes are a locus involved in L - ascorbate utilization ( SPy0175 - SPy0179); the citrate lyase locus ( SPy1186 - SPy1191); the Trx chromosomal locus ( SPy1582 - SPy1596) that includes the recently described, CovR - repressed two - component response regulator TrxR [ 42]; and the well - studied Mga ( SPy2010 - SPy2025), SpeB ( SPy2037 - SPy2042), and capsule synthesis ( SPy2200 - SPy2202) loci ( Fig. 3 and Fig. S4).
